front.title: OAM Configuration Framework and Requirements for GMPLS RSVP-TE

abstract.t: OAM functions are essential to ensure that the desired service levelof traffic engineered connections are met. In certain technologiesOAM entities are inherently established once the connection is setup. However other technologies, especially OAM for packet switchednetworks, require an extra configuration step after connectionestablishment to setup OAM entities.
